attributes.action: UK Veterans 100% Government Guaranteed Mortgages to live how they deserve.
attributes.additional_details:
Our Soldiers fought in live battlefields so we can sleep peacefully at night.
They defend and protect the British people and way of life.
One of those ways of life is owning a property, something of which is becoming increasingly more difficult to do.
The least the government could do is make it extremely easy for ex forces members when they leave to obtain THEIR OWN HOME. 
Not a social flat in a 200 strong tower block or a damp cardboard box behind a shopping centre.

Show them our respect.
attributes.background:
The UK's Veterans are faced with difficult housing solutions on discharge, if they are able to find work they shouldn't have the worry of finding the suitable housing they DESERVE.
I am petitioning for ex forces personnel who have served on operations to have access to a 100% Govt Backed mortgage.
